instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00840 Slow and Fans Loud
threads.message: Hello. Got this board here with loud fans and running REALLY slow. Ran HWMONITOR and various sensors are 128 celsius. They are: Ambient, CPU Proximity, PCH Die, Memory, System Proximity and Fan Inlet Right. Tried with new trackpad/cable, same issue. Replaced SMC as I suspected it was bad because of the number of sensors reading erratically, same result. Replaced U5870 also just in case. Same result. Any hints?

threads.title: 820-00840 Slow and Fans Loud
threads.message: Man, you are an encyclopedia! Disconnected the webcam and the problem stopped! Bad LCD assembly then?

threads.title: 820-00840 Slow and Fans Loud
threads.message:
Bad ALS, placed on webcam circuitry.
Reconnect webcam and remove R8556/58.
Check if works this way.

threads.title: 820-00840 Slow and Fans Loud
threads.message: It worked. Will tell to the costumer he will not have automatic brightness control anymore. Thanks!

threads.title: 820-00840 Slow and Fans Loud
threads.message:
oh man it worked indeed !!

Thank you very much [USER=682]@2informaticos[/USER] 

(y)(y)(y)
